ISSUE.TITLE: TTL marshal result is empty influencing /vol/status api result
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sponsors SeaweedFS via Patreon https://www.patreon.com/seaweedfs **Describe the bug** because TTL's members are invisible out of package, so when json.Marshal is called, all the TTL info are empty, which influences the /vol/status api ```golang type TTL struct { count byte unit byte } ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #862 from PapaYofen/fix-861 Fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/861
